content.p: We are very pleased to announce the upcoming Tri-campus Arts Festival, hosted here at UNMC. There are a number of very exciting performances from all three campuses, including the first Tri-campus production of 1001 Nights, with contributions from UNUK, UNNC and UNMC. In acknowledgement of UNMC’s 15 year Anniversary, tickets for all of these events are only RM15! The schedule is as follows: Date/Time Event Location Wednesday, 8 June 20:00 to 22:00 Mr. Donkey/驴得水 (UNNC) F4 Studio (100 seats) Thursday, 9 June 20:00 to 22:00 Oedipus (UNUK) Friday, 10 June 14:00 to 16:30 1001 Nights Matinee + workshop 20:00 to 22:00 1001 Nights Saturday, 11 June 13:00 Kampung Chekhov F4 studio (100 seats) Sunday, 12 June Lunchtime Concert with UNMC/UNUK/UNNC Choir/instrumentalists TBC 20:30 1001 Nights Gala (following Tri-Campus Games Ceremony) While Mr. Donkey and Oedipus are adult-themed, 1001 Nights is quite family-friendly! telephone: +603 8924 8000 fax: +603 8924 8001
